title: Toyota Kirloskar Motor looks to expand used car biz across key cities
description: Toyota Kirloskar Motor aims to expand its used car business in key cities with the inauguration of the first Toyota Used Car Outlet (TUCO) in New Delhi, targeting the growing Indian used car market.
